00013 
00014 TTAudioSignal::TTAudioSignal(TTUInt8 howMany)
00015         : vs(0), maxNumChannels(0), numChannels(0), sampleVectors(NULL)
00016 {
00017         TTUInt8 i;
00018 
00019         maxNumChannels = howMany;
00020         sampleVectors = (TTSampleVector *)malloc(sizeof(TTSampleVector) * maxNumChannels);
00021         for(i=0; i<maxNumChannels; i++)
00022                 sampleVectors[i] = NULL;
00023 }
00024 
00025 
00026 TTAudioSignal::~TTAudioSignal()
00027 {
00028         free(sampleVectors);
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 TTErr TTAudioSignal::setVector(TTUInt8 channel, TTSampleVector newVector)
00033 {
00034         // could check against maxnumchannels here
00035         sampleVectors[channel] = newVector;
00036         return 0;
00037 }
00038 
00039 
00040 TTUInt16 TTAudioSignal::getMinChannelCount(TTAudioSignal& signal1, TTAudioSignal& signal2)
00041 {
00042         if(signal1.numChannels > signal2.numChannels)
00043                 return signal2.numChannels;
00044         else
00045                 return signal1.numChannels;
00046 }
